content.description: Climb up broken blocks until a wide hands straight up 5.8 section that may require an arm bar. After this section there is a great, but short hands section to chain anchor.
content.location: Down and around the left from Fuzzy Nation. Make your way up a short scramble on the left side of the tower looking for the cracks.

content.description:
A 30m route broken up by two ledges into three distinct crack sections. The last section is the money, slightly overhung, uniform hand crack. The other cracks are a little awkward and non-uniform.

0. [15 ft] It starts as a 5.4 face climb to the first crack.

1. [25 ft] Irregular crack with a couple killer hand jams, but overall a mix of awkward hands and fingers to ledge.

2. [25 ft] Off this ledge is the bulge crux with tenuous gear in shallow crack that is hard to get into. There are pretty good feet to help you out but it is tricky. It gets better after 15 ft with a couple of killer finger jams to the ledge.

3. [25 ft] This is the money. A uniform killer hand crack for medium-hands folks (yellows and reds) that gets a little overhung until the pull over to anchor.

=== Top Roping ===

There is a bolt on the left of the route to help with rope drag against sharp rock.
content.protection: Double rack from 0.3-#2, one #3 and nuts+offsets
content.location: A couple minute walk left of Welcome to Nightvale.
